actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: To provide for a White House Conference on Rural Development and Agriculture.
short_title: White House Conference on Rural Development and Agriculture Act

summary.text: White House Conference on Rural Development and Agriculture Act - Directs the President to call a White House Conference on Rural Development and Agriculture, bringing together State, regional, and Federal representatives for the purpose of preserving and stimulating economic and cultural vitality in rural communities. Authorizes States to hold State or regional conferences. Requires a report to the President and the Congress. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: White House Conference on Rural Development and Agriculture Act
To provide for a White House Conference on Rural Development and Agriculture.
